charaepi_ch0279_00_kakeru/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking on the
beach when he heard some happy-sounding
voices...
charaepi_ch0279_00_kakeru/2301_1201_0200:
Wow! You guys are good! Can’t believe you can
keep up with me and Raichu!
charaepi_ch0279_00_kakeru/2301_1201_0300:
Haha! It’s a piece of cake because Pikachu and I
make the best team!
charaepi_ch0279_00_kakeru/2301_1201_0800:
I was surprised by how good Chase and Pikachu
were at surfing.
charaepi_ch0279_00_kakeru/2301_1201_0900:
This is how we used to skim over water back in
Kanto!
charaepi_ch0279_00_kakeru/2301_1201_1000:
Ohhh, I see! If you came to Alola, you’d be able to
move between islands easily!
charaepi_ch0279_00_kakeru/2301_1201_1100: Alola, huh? I’d love to go someday...
charaepi_ch0279_00_kakeru/2301_1201_1200:
I’ve seen Alolan Raichu with people in Kanto
before, but never so up close... It’s so cute!
charaepi_ch0279_00_kakeru/2301_1201_1300:
Did you know? Raichu’s cheeks release a sweet
scent when you touch them!
charaepi_ch0279_00_kakeru/2301_1201_1400: Wha—?! Really?! I gotta try this...
charaepi_ch0279_00_kakeru/2301_1201_1500: Hau, could I touch Raichu’s cheek just a little—
charaepi_ch0279_00_kakeru/2301_1201_1700:
Awww, are you jealous of all the attention
Raichu’s getting?
charaepi_ch0279_00_kakeru/2301_1201_1800: Don’t worry! You’re my only partner!
charaepi_ch0279_00_kakeru/2301_1201_1900: Do you not want Pikachu to evolve?
charaepi_ch0279_00_kakeru/2301_1201_2000:
Nope! I like Raichu and all, but I don’t plan on
evolving Pikachu.
charaepi_ch0279_00_kakeru/2301_0402_2400: Hehe, well yeah! That might be part of the reason!
charaepi_ch0279_00_kakeru/2301_1201_2500:
To be honest, Pikachu doesn’t like it when I try to
evolve him.
charaepi_ch0279_00_kakeru/2301_1201_2600: I don’t really know why, to be honest.
charaepi_ch0279_00_kakeru/2301_1201_2700:
Interesting. And he can surf too. Your Pikachu’s
one of a kind, Chase.
charaepi_ch0279_00_kakeru/2301_1201_2900:
If Pikachu doesn’t want to evolve, that’s fine
with me!
charaepi_ch0279_00_kakeru/2301_1201_3000:
Evolved or not, the bond between my partner and
me won’t change!
charaepi_ch0279_00_kakeru/2301_1201_3100:
I see. The most important things are the memories
and time you spend together, right?
charaepi_ch0279_00_kakeru/2301_1201_3300: We did surf a lot. I’m feeling a bit hungry too.
charaepi_ch0279_00_kakeru/2301_1201_3400: Hey, let’s all grab a bite to eat!
charaepi_ch0279_00_kakeru/2301_1201_3500: Sounds good! We were getting hungry too!
charaepi_ch0279_00_kakeru/2301_1201_3700: All right! How about we make it a race?
